0.description: Shadow 0; used on content and containers that need to sit flush with the underlying surface; also used for removing a previously defined shadow
0.deprecatedMessage: Avoid using this token. Use `box-shadow: none;` when needing to remove a shadow.

100.description: Shadow 100; used on surface-level content and components such as cards and control thumbs
100.deprecatedMessage: This token will be replaced with `--jh-shadow-low` in v2.

200.description: Shadow 200; used on components that overlay a portion of the UI such as FABs and toasts

300.description: Shadow 300; used on major sections of the UI such as menus
300.deprecatedMessage: This token will be replaced with `--jh-shadow-high` in v2.

400.description: Shadow 400; used on components that should overlay the entire UI such as dialogs
